name: High Five Dudes
description:
How do you approach making a game about trust? There are many approaches, and we combined establishing trust, breaking trust and something that all of us humans have - personality.  Just like you can  build up trust with someone you know, you can build up trust with the High Five Dudes. Just play around with the simulation and see how different choices produce different outcomes.

Each Dude has different personality and reacts differently to player’s actions depending on the character's nature, mood and previous interactions. This creates a rather complex system of building relations and trust with each Dude individually.

The project is one in the series of rapid prototypes made in less than a week. The intention of making games in team of 3 in extremely short development cycles was learning the methods and theory in order to develop game ideas into testable prototypes as quick as possible.
